website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for value and performance. It has a lot to offer for a price lower than others we tested.
pros: Stands out for being a razor and trimmer in one
Features five curve-sensing blades and built-in moisture
cons: The razor side's powerful blade should be used with caution, otherwise it might cause chafing and irritation

customer_reviews.title: Heaven sent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little trimmer. It is exactly what I needed. I've tried other methods that ended up cutting my lady parts. This product allowed me to do a very detailed job without injuries. It's also the perfect size for navigating the female anatomy. Which allowed me to achieve my desired style in just a few minutes! I was pretty bushy. So, if it worked for me. It can work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love it! But it dies. And I buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: This razor does a great job. It works well, super easy to use, I use it in the shower and it gets a nice, close trim. Awesome. My one complaint is that after a year or so I always ALWAYS need to replace it. Every time it stops working and I figure it’s battery needs to be replaced, I replace the battery then nothing. And with that said, this razor is so affordable and works so well (before it dies) I always just keep replacing it. I usually need a replacement after a year to a years worth of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Finally an Intimate Feminine Shaver/Trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: This 2 in 1 is a must have for EVERY woman! Cuts and removes hair effortlessly. The razor actually glides smoother while shaving in shower or when wet. Price point is unbelievably affordable for this advance waterproof technology, so glad I stumbled upon this!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Consider it just a trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Man I missed this. I tried replacing it with a couple of cheepo Chinese products with what I can only guess are fake reviews. Ouch! No lies the razor is not great, but there Is no comparison to the trimmer. If what you are looking for equates to a beard between 2-4 days (without the guard) or a buzz cut (with) then this is the one. I suppose I can see why the reviews are mostly 4 star sine 1/2 of the product isn’t great. Just ignore the razor. I mean don’t cut yourself lol. Buy it for the trimmer. It’s the best.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri L. Harden

customer_reviews.title: I want to give it 5 stars, but I can't love it due to design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great razor, if you only use it for everywhere that's easy to get to. As for more crevice-like areas, or curves, it is extremely difficult to use this razor, as opposed to the venus ones. I never had a problem shaving those areas with the venus razors. That being said, I way prefer the Schick because it stays sharper longer, and results in a nice shave elsewhere. Also much less expensive, which is super nice. I really wish the Schick could handle curves better.
customer_reviews.author: Potatoes O'brian

customer_reviews.title: Lasted way longer than I expected, great price on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand/style razor I have purchased for myself in years! The trimmer works great! I replaced the battery in my last one several times before it died for good. Now I'm on hydro number 2 and I would recommend it to everyone! The versatility of this thing is indispensable. Plus it's supremely affordable on here, don't try to buy it at CVS, you will pay at least double.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: A few months, tops.
customer_reviews.text: This just dies after a few months. I note other reviewers have mentioned similar below, and I’m sure many others experienced the same a few months after writing their 5-star review when the product first arrived and worked great. Sure, you can just buy another every 4 months... if you don’t mind chucking pieces of plastic and electrical machinery in the trash for our oceans to deal with. Since by 2025 we’re going to have more plastic in our seas than fish, I’d prefer not to add to the problem. Is it too much to ask for ONE product that lasts multiple years?
customer_reviews.author: CJ Ailey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Razor/Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I love this razor/trimmer. It’s the perfect size for the bikini area & works well. I haven’t cut myself or anything and my skin felt so smooth after using the razor. The trimmer does not do a close shave but a nice “buzz” cut that still works well for me. Hold down the power button for about 2-3 seconds & the trimmer will stay on instead of having to hold the button down. I love this product & highly recommend to those looking for a nice razor/trimmer!
customer_reviews.author: Briannah

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Razor
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Schick Hydro Silk TrimStyle Razor with Bikini Trimmer. Super easy to use. Love that you can add refillable attachments. The blade glides over my legs and knees without scratching or cutting. Just glides smoothly. Blade is very moisturized so I get a clean fresh shave leaving my legs soft. I really love the bikini trimmer because it does wonders. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Wiest

customer_reviews.title: Great, smooth shave; have to replace blades VERY often.
customer_reviews.text: These razors are fantastic on first use. I got the smoothest shave, probably ever, and with no razor burn. My skin was very happy. However, when I use the schick quattro razors, I only have to change razors maybe once every couple of weeks or even per month. When I use these, I have to switch after just 3 or 4 uses. So, while it works really well for that first few times, I don't think it's worth all the blades I will go through in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great razor!
customer_reviews.text: This really worked well, the little trimmer, I expected to kind of work because, frankly it's on a disposable razor. But it worked just as well as one I would have paid 50 bucks for. Impressed! I just wish the razor side was as good as the men's version!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Kordasiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Get a Grip on Shaving
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for those who shave in the shower. The grip is suitable for smaller hands or bigger hands to grasp onto. The blades are awesome! As someone with sensitive skin, I've easily nicked myself with new blades - not with this razor. Changing the blades out is as easy as a snap. The only problem I have is after time the refill cartridge does fall off of the blade which could be dangerous, especially in the shower while shaving. I noticed that sometimes not even switching the blade cartridge out works to solve that issue. Other than that razor bump, this is about the best reusable razor I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction to razor
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I purchased this back in November. I'm writing this review six months later because of the issues I have. The trimmer worked great and I was very pleased with it. However, the razor is awful. Not because it doesn't work, but because *every* time I use it I break out. Legs, armpits, bikini area... It's awful. A red rash and itchy fluid filled tiny bumps. Classic allergic reaction. I even tried taking a break using it to see if it was something else. Nope. And it's not like I have sensitive skin either, I can use those cheap bic razors no problem. Not sure what it is about this razor, but I will never buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: thingamajiggly

customer_reviews.title: I worked two times and then it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I had an older one that I used for about three years but it got really rusty so I decided to buy a new one, So dissapointed. It worked two times and then it stopped working. I tried replacing the battery three different times. With different brands of batteries as well. Two uses out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Customer J

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a week. Broken already. The battery powered part works ok... but if the guard for controlling length is on then you’re out of luck. Won’t do anything. I used the regular razor part a couple of times and it was nice. Until the head randomly fell off and WOULD NOT stay back on. I tried forever to get it to stay but I just ended up shredding my fingers on the blades. Maybe I’m just unlucky and got a defective one? But maybe I’m not. If you want a couple of decent shaves then this will work. Personally, I’m gonna go buy some disposables and get a much better experience from them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect "buzz cut"
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to get a "buzz cut" style shave of my private area. Other similar items usually have the guard too high, so the hair stays too long and defeats the purpose. This is perfect. Haven't used the razor side, so can't comment. But didn't buy it for that. No issues with the button or powering it on and off as others have mentioned. Works great. If it stops working as other reviews I've mentioned, I would definitely buy it again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R.

customer_reviews.title: NOT for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This razor cut me in 2 places and left a bloody rash on my legs. Too bad I can’t return this item.
customer_reviews.author: isa

customer_reviews.title: It’s great, not for everybody, but it’s definitely worth trying!
customer_reviews.text: I hate shaving and I love this product! I made this purchase mostly for the trimmer and I wish I would have done it sooner. I get irritation and ingrown hairs like crazy due to keratosis pilaris so I don’t like a bare shave, this trimmer was perfect for me. Easy, fast, effective and no pain. For those who injured themselves or are complaining that there is “no tutorial on how to use”...lol how did you make it this far is life? Lol seriously tho...how?
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Are these genuine?
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend gave me a couple of these chick razors about a year ago and I just loved them they seem to last forever and they did what they claimed and I never cut myself, not once!! My razor came with supposedly two refills but one was missing and the plastic container had been opened! I needed the razor that day so I decided to go ahead and use it. Big mistake! Cut me in four different places on my legs little tiny cuts didn't bleed but it stung for hours! It didnt moisturize either! Not the same product! Extremely disappointed and upset!!, 😞
customer_reviews.author: David T

customer_reviews.title: exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a very standard women's razor. I was surprised to discover that this product was a significant upgrade from my previous razor. The moisturizer dots above and below the blades work so well that I don't even need to use soap or shaving gel/cream. Granted, I don't have a lot hair to shave, but still! I just wet the razor, and it glides right over my skin. A surprisingly good buy.
customer_reviews.author: L.Ch.

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with this razor. The hydro gel seems to rub off after only 1 or 2 shaves, it breaks easily if dropped (I foolishly ordered another one after the first broke), and it doesn't cut the hair crisply to the skin without extra effort that often requires touching up my legs outside of the shower. I only end up using the razor about 3 to 5 times until I get fed up with it and trash it. I won't continue to purchase refills.
customer_reviews.author: Jed Stoken

customer_reviews.title: Not for close shave
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and it did not work for trimming a semi-close shave. I did not expect a bare close-to-skin shave but this removed nothing for me. I tried everything as directed (both with and against the growth of hair) but I think this trimmer is just not for me. If you’re looking for a close shave, I’m not sure this will work. Perhaps may work if you have longer hair that you are trying to trim. Otherwise, it seems to be built nicely and the quality seems nice.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Z.

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin? Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin, and this made me break out. It felt very rough on the skin to and fell apart really fast. I have purchased this in store without those issues so I don't understand why the experience was different with this one I ordered. Wouldn't reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Things have gotten a little out of control due to COVID quarantine
customer_reviews.text: I'll be totally upfront here and say things downstairs have gotten completely out of control due to being single and working from home during quarantine. I bought this little gadget after I cut my skin with the scissors I used to use (Oh GOD the pain!). The unit fits in my lady hand just fine but I do have some wrist issues with my dominant hand and every time I use it my wrist hurts for a couple hours afterward. Also I feel like it burnt through the batteries pretty fast but I freely admit that I go quite a while between trims so it's a jungle down there when I do use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bellingham Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Fingers cramps, inconsistent lengths
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't realize you had to hold down the power button to use the trimmer. And it requires a strong press, so is difficult to hold for more than 10 sec at a time. Also, I thought I could just run the trimmer through my hair from a couple different angles and it would cut a consistent length. Wow, actually the opposite. I found I had to hold the hair taunt to cut each hair (bikini line) and then the lengths were cut very inconsistent. There has to be an easier way!
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Plum Fairy

customer_reviews.title: My Trimmer For Life
customer_reviews.text: I wish I was brave enough to try other trimmers but this one has been an old reliable for years. I always buy a new one though because after a while it molds up. That's truly my only gripe about it. It lasts a long time though and if it didn't have that mold issue, I'm sure I'd still have the first one i ever bought and would just be replacing the blades like normal ppl do, rather than throwing the whole thing away.
customer_reviews.author: Malanie

customer_reviews.title: my favorite razor
customer_reviews.text: I love the options you get with this razor. The bikini trimmer gives me a nice short trim when i'm feeling too lazy to go bare. And the actual razor gives me a close shave. The best part is that i can just change the razor head, which the refills come in many different options. The bikini trimmer lasts a long time before you need to change batteries.
customer_reviews.author: KNWright

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Razor, Good Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the trimmer, not the razor. I’ll review the razor first. It was not good. I have coarse hair and very sensitive skin. I generally use Gillette, and this razor tore up my skin and I came out with several more bloody knicks that usual. Also, whatever the gel stuff is that is supposed to help your shave immediately becomes gooey and gross. Oh, and the shave wasn’t very close, even with 5 blades. Not a fan. The trimmer is good. It has 3 settings and is very easy to use. I’ve used it twice now with no issues or concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Cut but happy
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer is great. The reason I'm giving this 4 stars is because I have cuts all over my legs due to the razor. I read that shaving cream isn't necessary with this so I didn't use any. Umm, big mistake? I have very sensitive skin and maybe if I had had the extra protection and nourishment of a shaving cream (or anything besides water) the razor wouldn't have cut me so much. Now I understand why Schick sells sensitive skin refills for the razor. It's not for everyone. The trimmer, though, is hands down my favorite do-it-yourself-because-nothing-is-open-due-to-quarantine beauty tool. I don't think I'm going back to the awkwardness and expense of getting waxes after trying this.
customer_reviews.author: Vookworm

customer_reviews.title: Love my new trimmer & razor.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it & I am so happy w/ it. I just used the trimmer side only but I've used the schick razors before & they work pretty good but boy, is the trimmer amazing. It doesn't cut or pull on your hair on private area. I got since it's summer & needed it for the bikini area also not only for that just to keep that area clean. So happy it came & that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Makes Shaving a Breeze
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! It made the process 100% easier. The trimmer side has 3 settings that you can use with the guard or you can take the guard off and get an even closer cut. When the guard is removed there is still no pinching or nicks - it trims effortlessly. I then followed with the shaver end for a clean cut. If you’re thinking about buying the product, do it!
customer_reviews.author: TexasAggie

customer_reviews.title: Not close enough
customer_reviews.text: The product is a good. I feel like the moisture strip was done after the first use. The triming side is great if you want to bring it down a little and then shape it with the razor. For me I needed to get a closer trim and can not use the razor on my private parts (I get ingrown hair when I do) when take off the guard it is not gentle on the private parts and snips the skin just a little. When it's left on it's fine but does not give a very close trim. If you like to take a risk for the price go for it but I upgraded to a better trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: Something different here? they don't feel like the ones I get fromWalmart 🤨
customer_reviews.text: This is my brand razor&the only kind I will use it's like shaving my legs with silk no friction ... usually I'm not sure if I just got a bad set.1st.thought I got DisposableI.Got the handle already.These to keep at my mom's. The picture of the packaging is exactly the same as the disposable package on the site which is fine I still got my razors but the blades are discolored I didn't like how it looks dirty. and then it looked like a lot of debris in between the blades it's just warrant the same color as my other ones fresh out of the package
customer_reviews.author: Jessicaj

customer_reviews.title: Am I missing something?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. I really did! The razor is fine--much like other multi-blade Schick razors--and moisturizes well, but I won't pay this much for one razor. The trimmer...is a joke. Maybe I got a defective product, but it's pretty much useless regardless of the hair's length. Going back to  I have to replace it every 6-12 months but it works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: J. Maclauchlan

customer_reviews.title: Great little trimmer
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little trimmer. I’ve used the shaver side and it’s alright. I mainly bought this for the trimmer side and it gets the job done. If your trying to maintain your bush then this is a great way to do it. However, I don’t think this would be useful for going completely bare. You might need something a little more durable to do that job.
customer_reviews.author: Curl

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on private area. It was very safety to use. I was nervous at first. Very close shave and no itching afterwards. I’d definitely buy this again if I had to. I don’t like using the razor down there and don’t like the itching if I shave close. The guard on this makes this perfect.
customer_reviews.author: justice

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver, but the one I got from here stopped working after 8 mos of light use
customer_reviews.text: This is the shaver I prefer, it cuts well and is adjustable so you can take off all or a little hair. (I don't use the leg shaver part, just the battery operated shaver) Unfortunately this one seems lower quality than the one I got in a store. It suddenly refused to turn on after only 8 months of pretty light use. The one I got in store lasted probably 2 yrs before the blade just got too dull. I can't find this in stores anymore or else I would stop buying this listing.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Janky junk
customer_reviews.text: I had a few of these years ago and I thought well since I can't see my wax chick during these bonkers times, I'll get another one of these to tame the power muff until things go back to normal. At the least, I assumed it would be the same and at best they would have improved it and it would be awesome. Y'all, how did this thing get worse? How! For a few more dollars, you can get a trimmer that actually works. Skip this. Your bits will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once and already love it. I am a large girl so hard to see what I'm doing always afraid of cutting my self. This made things so much easier, quick and painless. And it is an awesome price all others I saw were so pricey. Only thing I see that may be an issue is my botton is a little off and I have to hit it hard to make it stay on but to me that is minor. Also it did not come with any refills. But for the price I can not complain I think it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron H.

customer_reviews.title: Razor Bumps/Irritation
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this for my bikini area, because I need a razor that won't cause irritation (apart from electric razors, I have not found a razor that works for me). This one had high ratings and sounded promising. I took precautions before and after shaving to try and avoid irritation, but I'm on day 3 after shaving and still irritated. It also irritates my legs after shaving. Not good for sensitive skin at all!
customer_reviews.author: LilyoftheThorns

customer_reviews.title: Broke out in red bumps from these. Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Long story short. These SUCK. Worst shavers I’ve bought in a long time. I would compare them with the disposable ones. They made my skin rough, gave me ingrown hairs, and did not moisturize my skin at all! I had red bumps all over my body from these shavers. They don’t give you a close shave either!!! Even when I just opened them and used shaving cream. Do not buy these!! I will continue using Venus razors from now on.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin. Finding the perfect razor has always been a struggle. So many companies claim that their product is for sensitive skin, but my skin still has a reaction to it. My skin finally met it's match with this one. If you have sensitive skin and are wanting a close shave, this is the perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana DiLorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Ready for the summer swimming LOL
customer_reviews.text: Summer is coming and this is just what I needed for swimming. Saw the good reviews and decided on this one. It works both as a regular leg shaver and a bikini trimmer and you can use it while you shower. I was a bit afraid first cause it's battery operated but it's fully seal so no need to be afraid of getting electrocuted. I like that you can adjust the length of cut on the trimmer portion and its easy to use. Came apart easily for fast cleaning afterwards. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great tool, but...
customer_reviews.text: It only last about 2 months. This was my second time buying one as I enjoyed using it as my daily razor as well as trimming up.. I thought the first one I bought (which was from walmart) was perhaps faulty, so i bought one from amazon as well. Both purchases lasted less than 2 months separately and as much as I miss the convenience and the price tag that came along with it, I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Adkison

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for many years and I’ve always loved the product. The shaver head is sharp and moisturizing, and the trimmer is also easy to use. The product is compact and great for traveling! However recently with my last two purchases, the trimmer just randomly stopped working and still didn’t work when I replaced the battery. This has happened to me twice so I’m curious as to what is happening, whether this is a quality issue for just one batch or decrease in the product quality in general. Overall, still a great shaving tool to have in the bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Kchong0728

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to ever happen to me
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely life changing lol so in love with this. Accidentally stepped on the razor part so i cant rate that but the electric side is so great. Its made cleaning up the lady good less of a chore and im definitely more excited to do it than ive ever been, love having the option of choosing the hair length even tho i use the same setting every time. Id highly recommend if you shave or trim your lady or man parts often or even not so often! id suggest getting a little brush to clean the hair out of the blades tho!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent production
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product years ago, but recently repurchased it. PLEASE SOMEONE TELL ME IF THIS IS NORMAL? If you look closely at the little prong on the left, it is thicker that the one on the right. (Ignore the one in the middle.) Because the prongs are not the same size, it is SOOO HARD TO GET THE RAZOR HEADS ON. It is the bane of my my existence any time I need a new razor head or I drop the razor and it pops off. Good product. Inconsistent production apparently. 4 stars because it’s typically a great quality product
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I started buying this product when it first came out before it became the Hydro. It used to be one of my favorite products. But once they switched over to hydro I noticed it didn’t work as well or as long. The pieces would come apart easy. The last one I bought didn’t work well at all didn’t cut the hair like it should and it fell apart after two uses. I gave it three tries and I will no longer be buying this product. So disappointed it used to be my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd write a review on a razor, but this thing is amazing. It works great with the 5 blades - my legs are silky smooth. When wet, the heads release a moisturizer that helps the razor glide along your leg. You still need soap/shaving gel. The trimmer also works great for "womanscaping". I was worried that it would die quickly and not stand up to getting wet, but it's lasted for over 8 months. I liked mine so much, I bought a second one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D. Twilling

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I’ve used Gilette Excel women’s sensitive for 20+yrs. They’ve stopped making the refills. So looking for another razor. The moisturizer on the sides of the razor was gone after one use. So gooey that I about dropped the razor a few times. Then it was gone. Doesn’t give the close smooth shave like my other razor. And TRULY does not do anything but leave razor burns around the bikini area!
customer_reviews.author: ritarambles

customer_reviews.title: Like the electric razor, good close shave without bumps or ingrown hairs
customer_reviews.text: Electric part gives a Nice close shave (as good as expected without razor) with no razor bumps or ingrown hairs when using the shaver which is what i need downtown, this is my second one and i love the electric shaver part i can shave fast (im lazy but like a clean look) n easy without worrying about knicks and bumps. I had my last one for over a year and then figured i should get a new one and this one looks a little diff but works like a charm. One battery and its waterproof and battery lasts for a while before needing to replace!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: In theory I liked this razor but both the older version (the one that was teal) and this current version both inexplicably stopped working. I tried changing the batteries, cleaning the inner part of the razor, and nothing would work. It was just dead. I thought the first time was a fluke but unfortunately not. It’s too bad because I loved the convenience of the 2-in-1. There are so many positive reviews which makes me think this isn’t a common problem but I don’t want to buy a third just to have the same thing happen. I did use the first one occasionally with the shower on but I’m pretty sure I only used the new one dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super super disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Super super disappointed! This item was delivered to me on March 21, 2020. I used it once and it was great. I tried to use it today April 7, 2020 for the second time and it stopped working. I change the battery, but it still did not work. WTF?
customer_reviews.author: Samir & Lopa Kapur

customer_reviews.title: BEST use within the first 3 months, broke in 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer is great but only for a short while. I would only use it 1-3 times between 1-2 months, and with in 6 months of its original purchase. I get waxed, so I don’t need to use it weekly or daily. But I can’t imagine if I did. I’m sure it would have broken sooner. It’s nice and cute and easy to use, but doesn’t last, and will really start to lose it’s buzz around 3 months. Not really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MJR Industries

customer_reviews.title: You need this if you have a 🐱
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these and I just love it! I use the razor end for my legs and armpits and the electric end for my downstairs and I’ll never go back. I never got any razor burn whatsoever and my smoothness lasts three days or more!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before you buy
customer_reviews.text: The moisturizing border on the blade head when it gets wet is a goopey mess. Cannot stand it. Wish the Shick Quattro was still available in stores. Too expensive online
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All-in-one and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this product for the first time and it worked great! So easy to use and my pubic area feels great. I initially read the reviews how it stops working after half a year/a year and with the performance of it, I’m totally fine with buying a replacement when that happens. This item runs on a battery so you can’t expect it to last forever so you can pass it down to your grandchildren.... It will stop working at one point and when it does, you will more than likely want to buy another one. I guarantee it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to hold/use
customer_reviews.text: Although I do like this product and still use it, I won't be repurchasing it. You have to HOLD DOWN on the power button for the blade to move, which is really inconvenient. Half the time my thumb gets tired and I'll subconsciously slacken my grip, and then the razor shuts off and will almost pinch my skin. I like everything else about the razor, it's almost perfect with how close of a shave it gives. But having to manually press down the power button is a real turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Works great until the trimmer motor dies
customer_reviews.text: Love these, works well for what I need, BUT the motor of the trimmer has never lasted more than a year for me, which means I've bought this product 4 or 5 times. Even if I never expose the razor to water, the whole thing just quits working over time despite trying new batteries. I continue to repurchase since the product works well, and I just use the dead ones as handles for the end of the razor that I use on my legs, but it would be nice if the motor in the trimmer lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Works until the original battery dies
customer_reviews.text: So when this product actually works it's great. Perfect for the shower to trim. However, I've ordered 2 of these and both times after the original battery dies out the trimmer barely functions until it just stops working altogether. Not very useful if I have to buy a new one every 4 months. Don't recommend if you want something you can actually switch the battery out on.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Finch

customer_reviews.title: Brittle and clogs easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor a while ago, and honestly, the razor itself wasn't that amazing, but the trimmer is helpful and extremely useful. If you're clumsy like me and drop it constantly, pieces will fly off and sometimes are hard to put back together. The razor's blades clog super easily, and often left me with razor burns after my shower, despite using lotions and shave butter to try and avoid this. I thought this would be a product to try and lower my waste by just buying a new razor head each month instead of the whole thing, but I found my Costco-pack disposables work so much better to get a close shave. Only here for the trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I use this for dog grooming. Dont laugh, it works!
customer_reviews.text: I know this sounds crazy but I use this to trim around the face of my 8lb Maltese/ShihTzu. He hates going to the groomer so I started grooming him myself. While I use my regular dog clippers for his body, it is too large and too noisy to use around his tiny face. Shock hydro to the rescue! Its quiet and it doesn't freak him out.
customer_reviews.author: L. Eittreim

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I like that this shaver has a manual shave and also the electric side. The electric side is perfect for trimming while the manual side is great for a closer / cleaner shave. Works great. Only thing is that the electric side is very small so you would have to keep washing it in order to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: forget the razor - this trimmer is a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really expect much from a $10 razor and trimmer, but honestly it does a great job. It takes AAA batteries which are easy to change out. A few times I've gotten worried the blades were becoming dull on the trimmer, but once I popped a new battery in there it was ready to go. Lets me clean up quickly and easily, and usually pain-free, although I have made a few careless mistakes without the trim guard on there. The trimmer doesn't give you a clean shave, but it gets pretty close. A must-have for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my wife and this is her review: As someone who has battled razor burn and the horror that comes after shaving, I have to say, this razor is a game changer. I tried it immediately after receiving it and got a close shave with no irritation. It was so much faster and easier to use than even an expensive electric hair trimmer. I’ve seen from other reviews that it wears out after a year, but $12 dollars a year is totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Avila

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It was great until it stopped working. I am disappointed I purchased refills for the razor. It was working fine, and I didn’t use the bikini trimmer too often, but it just stopped turning on. I thought maybe it was the battery but I tried replacing it and it just wont turn on. I saw a few reviews where people had the same problem but I ordered it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: love it while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time having this trimstyle razor and I LOVE it while it lasts. The first one lasted maybe a year? before the trim side stopped working. I replaced the batteries but it still didn't work. Luckily it's not a major expense and I love it so much while it works that I'm willing to buy new ones when I have to. A word of advice for the refills: I have fairly sensitive legs but the sensitive refills actually sting! The regular ones don't cause me any trouble at all though :)
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Trim it up
customer_reviews.text: I had one for like 7 years and it broke but I want to admit that I made it die sooner from dropping it so many times from up high on the shower caddy. The blade put just came apart so it was time for a new one... these work amazing and lasts for a long time. I’m a trimmer rather than a shaver. If you are too or want to be then this is the best tool to use
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Good razor and trimmer
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my third time buying one of these. I get at least a year's worth of use out of each one. I take the battery out after each use to make it last longer. Obviously I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: ❤
customer_reviews.text: I only use this for my bikini area because of the electric part. The regular razor part isn't all that great, and makes my skin feel slimy. I have a much better razor for my legs anyway. Overall it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After Minimal Use...
customer_reviews.text: This product used to be great but there must be some faulty manufacturing happening. As many others have stated the trimmer just stops working after minimal use. There is no sign of water in the battery area. I've tried multiple different types of batteries but no avail. Had not even had it 5 months before it stopped working. Save your money and buy something better if you're using it for the trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great During Quarantine
customer_reviews.text: I like many others can no longer get waxed during this time so a sudden growth of my hair was not appreciated so I bought this to help with that! The trimmer side did such a great job though I forgot shaving can result in extreme itchiness down there 😫and a super smooth shave with the regular razor side. Thanks, Schick!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: You guyssss you can hold down the button for the trimmer to stay on. Also take off the component for a closer shave. I willbe buying again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: LoveliEst

customer_reviews.title: Best razors hands down
customer_reviews.text: Love theae razors i can only use theae razoes so i dont have to shave everyday !!! Thwy make your skin feel soo smooth and soft works great with gillette shave gel
customer_reviews.author: Punky

customer_reviews.title: Not as good
customer_reviews.text: I love the disposable ones I get from Target or Walmart. I don’t know if it’s because. Got it off amazon or because these are the reusable kind but they are NOT as buttery smooth as the disposable ones I get in person. I ended my Billie prescription because I preferred the smooth sleek shave I get after using the disposable ones and I was very disappointed in these. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amani

customer_reviews.title: Good trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I love this trimmer it’s very easy to use I was skeptical buying it because I wanted it for my bikini area. But it worked well I didn’t really get a close shave but I went over the area a couple of times and it worked just fine, also it gets in the crease very well. I didn’t use the actual razor but I think it’s a good add on if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunte

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!! Wish I would have had it years ago...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought this thing sooner! Easy to use and worked fabulously. I really love the razor part of it. Super smooth shave and no razor bumps!
customer_reviews.author: K Croley

customer_reviews.title: Will pull your hairs and cause irritation which leads to ingrown hairs
customer_reviews.text: I was exited to get this product but when I tried it.... it left my skin burning, it pulls the hair (shaved my legs) and caused irritation. This is bad cause it leads to bumpy skin and ingrown hairs. Not a good experience from me.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Best razor I have used
customer_reviews.text: After just one use I can say this is probably the best razor I've ever used, and I never leave reviews. It is noticeably softer and smoother on skin, I have bumpier skin and sometimes razors can be painful and sharp going over my skin when shaving, but this razor was extremely gentle I almost thought it wasn't even shaving my legs. Works extremely well if you have sensitive or rougher skin, gentle and removes all hair no problem! I was even able to shave recently shaven areas, which usually leaves my skin irritated and slightly burned, but no issues like that with this razor. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie Simms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quarantine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a trimmer. From the reviews I expected the razor portion to be terrible. I actually like both. The trimmer is easy to use and fairly narrow for maneuvering. Will buy again when it stops working- hopefully not for awhile but the cost makes it pretty replaceable as long as I get a couple months out of it
customer_reviews.author: Yael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It’s so easy to use! The trimmer has an adjustable head to control the length of the hair and the other end of a razor that moisturizes super well! It uses one AAA battery, which is easily replaced by twisting the device and inserting a new one.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February but only got around to using it for the first time this week. The button doesn’t work so you have to hold it down to keep it on. Okay, so worked out that bit, but then tried to trim and it doesn’t trim a damn thing. I obviously have a duff one and it’s past the window for return so I’m screwed. :(
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: After 2 years just ordered my 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: yes you will need to replace the battery other than that 2 full years mine finally died and I had to get a new one. For many years I trimmed down there with scissors. An endless cycle of cut bleed cut bleed. Now with this no cut no bleed. Fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bikini razor
customer_reviews.text: This razor is great! I usually can’t shave around my bikini area because it’s too sensitive, but this didn’t seem to give me nearly as much razor burn as others have. The only annoying thing about it is that the power button sticks; you really have to press it kinda hard to get it to turn on. Overall this a good razor and I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Great razor, okay trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I like the razor more than the trimmer. The razor gives a clean cut especially for the under arm areas without irritating the skin. On the other hand, this product doesn't provide a complete shave for the bikini area as I expected. The trimmer misses a lot of hair and doesn't trim as close enough to the skin even when I use the lowest setting. If you're looking for a quick trim and not clean cut for your private area, this would be an ideal choice for you, plus $13 for a razor-trimmer combo is a good deal compared to some of the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: yadiyada

customer_reviews.title: Such an upgrade from conventional shaving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I read the reviews that people use it for their area down there. From experience, it does work in terms of trimming the hair. It did not hurt, it was easy to use, and looked and felt sturdy. I’ve been using mine for a month now and I haven’t had any problems. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and have struggled to find a razor that doesn't give me terrible razor burn. This is by far the best razor I ever used. I can shave everyday and not have to worry about irritation. I have used for about a week and the razor still seems to have a lot of moisturizer in the strip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great shave but the trimmer doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! A gentle shave and I love the trim feature as well. My only complaint is they seem to only last about a year before I have to replace them. Normally don’t even have to change the battery before it dies so not super sure why they even bother with a replaceable battery.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I had to write a review right away. As soon as I got this in the mail, I immediately tried it. I used the trimmer for about 10 seconds and I was amazed. Total game changer...where has this thing been all my life??? Seriously people, go get one! It trimmed down nice and close, totally painless, and very neat. What used to take forever with scissors is now quick and much better looking.
customer_reviews.author: shoppinglover

customer_reviews.title: ladies grooming must have
customer_reviews.text: Had this before but lost it .. razor worka great in the shower.. however I feel the trimmer works best when you and it are dry
customer_reviews.author: ladydragon

customer_reviews.title: Really Smooth Shave
customer_reviews.text: I accidently bought these refill cartridges before I bought the razor so instead of returning the cartiridges I decided to just buy the razor. It really is such a smooth shave! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not an economic alternative, but still good
customer_reviews.text: Loved this razor. Do not expect it to live forever. Electrics died before the battery died. When it worked, I loved it. The heads for the razor end are are exceedingly moisturizing. When I have a new head, I don't need shaving cream. It's neat that you can remove the guard to shave closer. I just think it's stupid that it's not effectively battery operated.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: One of the better ones i’ve found
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a hard time finding a good razor that actually does the job, especially in the bikini area. Very impressed, very sturdy. It moisturizes well & doesn’t give me any ugly bumps afterwards . The bikini trimmer is okay , but one of the better ones i’ve found . Took a couple times to get a smooth outcome and my bikini area was far from bad but it got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: mscarnecchia

customer_reviews.title: Razor
customer_reviews.text: Schick Hydro silk not as great if you have sensitive skin and the constant holding for the other side when using for the bikini area is very uncomfortable . Which I didn’t have to hold it constantly. I thought going by the review this product was going to great but truly for me I regret purchasing it because my skin got very irritated . :(
customer_reviews.author: LESLY

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this especially for the trimmer and it worked fine at first. The razor end gave a smooth shave and replacement blades are easy to find. The trimmer didn't have much power and was a little more narrow than what I had before. I didn't use it very often but after a year the trimmer quit working. I wouldn't be giving any review had it lasted longer, it just seems like a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H. Bitterly

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I thought!
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for something that would allow for me to be able to groom myself without all the extra attachments and accessories, and this does exactly what I wanted! I do wish it could be charged instead of battery usage. And I don't care for the razor end, as it seems to put out too much lubrication, which makes it hard to actually shave. But beyond that, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alise

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've used a bikini trimmer, which I didn't really know were a thing, and I'm happy with the results! I do wish though that there was an/off switch instead of having to hold the power button the whole time. I already have a razor I like, so I haven't tried the razor part of it
customer_reviews.author: AmyD

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no for me
customer_reviews.text: First time used, I dropped it in the shower, and it broke.. very bulky. Saw a YouTube video a woman swore by it.. it’s a no for me. I love the 5 blades on the razor tho. The little time I had before dropping and breaking the electric side, I found it to be not worth the buy, as I have a straight/curly silky blend of hair. Quite thick, and barely took off 8 strands after numerous attempts to the same spot.
customer_reviews.author: Tara G.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to do with the company, but beware
customer_reviews.text: I received this product that was a return. The battery was already placed in the trimmer and there were hairs in the trimmer head itself... I was highly disappointed, I think returns should not be eligible for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thalia

customer_reviews.title: Dead within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This electric razor was pretty alright while it lasted. I liked that it was small and easy to use wherever needed, but it only lasted two and a half months before dying. Even with a thorough cleaning and a new battery, it could not be revived. I will look for something more reliable to replace this cute piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

product_meta.title: Schick Hydro Silk TrimStyle Moisturizing Razor for Women with Bikini Trimmer,1 Count
product_meta.description: Style Name:Hydro Silk TrimstyleSchick Hydro Silk Trim Style for women razor offers dual function in an easy-to-use, compact tool. The moisturizing, water-activated conditioning serum, the five curve-sensing blades, and a battery-powered trimmer with three length settings, is ideal for your bikini area and offers a close, clean, comfortable shaving experience.
feature_bullets: Hydrating razor & waterproof bikini trimmer in 1 for the ultimate convenience
Hypo-allergenic moisturizing serum, dermatologist-tested and helps replenish skin's natural moisture for up to two hours after shaving
Five curve sensing blades with unique skin guards to smooth skin throughout every stroke, helping to reduce irritation while providing ultimate closeness
Built-in waterproof trimmer that can be used in or out of the shower for convenient bikini maintenance
Adjustable comb with four settings for a customized trim length and clean look and feel

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
